subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer birdied the final seven holes for a share of the first-round lead with Meg Mallon in the Tournament of Champions in Mobile, Ala., ending Suzann Pettersen’s run at the top of the leader board at six rounds. Creamer and Mallon shot five-under 67s, leaving them two strokes ahead of Pettersen, Natalie Gulbis, Pat Hurst, Mi Hyun Kim and Seon Hwa Lee. Pettersen was coming off consecutive victories in South Korea and Thailand, and has won three of her last four starts.
